Reference

Render Boolean Distance

Render Black and White

Clamp Image

Render Color Correction Matrix (3x3, linear RGB)

Render Convert Colorspace

render_convolution()

Render Convolution

render_convolution_fft()

Render Convolution FFT

render_crop()

Crop Image

render_exposure()

Apply exposure compensation (in stops)

render_image_overlay()

Add Overlay

render_reorient()

Reorient Image

render_resized()

render_text_image()

Generate Text Image

render_title()

Render a Title on an Image

render_tonemap()

Render Tonemap

render_vignette()

Add Vignette Effect

render_white_balance()

Render White Balance (Bradford CAT)

interpolate_array()

Matrix/Array Interpolation

Deprecated Functions

Use the render_* versions instead.

Add Overlay (Deprecated)

add_title()

Add Title Function (deprecated)
